ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُزَّمِّلُ
ayas.translation: O thou wrapped up in thy raiment!
ayas.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal muzzammil

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.

ayas.arabic: قُمِ ٱلَّيْلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
ayas.translation: Keep vigil the night long, save a little -
ayas.transliteration: qumil layla illā qalīlā

ayas.arabic: نِّصْفَهُۥٓ أَوِ ٱنقُصْ مِنْهُ قَلِيلًا
ayas.translation: A half thereof, or abate a little thereof
ayas.transliteration: niṣfahu awin-quṣ minhu qalīlā

ayas.arabic: أَوْ زِدْ عَلَيْهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَرْتِيلًا
ayas.translation: Or add (a little) thereto - and chant the Qur'an in measure,
ayas.transliteration: aw zid `alayhi warattilil qur-āna tartīlā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّا سَنُلْقِى عَلَيْكَ قَوْلًا ثَقِيلًا
ayas.translation: For we shall charge thee with a word of weight.
ayas.transliteration: innā sanulqī `alayka qawlan thaqīlā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيْلِ هِىَ أَشَدُّ وَطْـًٔا وَأَقْوَمُ قِيلًا
ayas.translation: Lo! the vigil of the night is (a time) when impression is more keen and speech more certain.
ayas.transliteration: inna nāshi-atal layli hiya ashaddu waṭ-an wa-aqwamu qīlā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ لَكَ فِى ٱلنَّهَارِ سَبْحًا طَوِيلًا
ayas.translation: Lo! thou hast by day a chain of business.
ayas.transliteration: inna laka fin nahāri sabḥan ṭawīlā

ayas.arabic: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا
ayas.translation: So remember the name of thy Lord and devote thyself with a complete devotion -
ayas.transliteration: wadhkuris-ma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabtīlā

ayas.arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًا
ayas.translation: Lord of the East and the West; there is no Allah save Him; so choose thou Him alone for thy defender -
ayas.transliteration: rabbul mashriqi wal maghribi lā ilāha illā huwa fattakhidh-hu wakīlā

ayas.arabic: وَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱهْجُرْهُمْ هَجْرًا جَمِيلًا
ayas.translation: And bear with patience what they utter, and part from them with a fair leave-taking.
ayas.transliteration: waṣbir `alā mā yaqūlūna wāhjurhum hajran jamīlā

ayas.arabic: وَذَرْنِى وَٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ أُو۟لِى ٱلنَّعْمَةِ وَمَهِّلْهُمْ قَلِيلًا
ayas.translation: Leave Me to deal with the deniers, lords of ease and comfort (in this life); and do thou respite them awhile.
ayas.transliteration: wadharnī wal mukadhhibīna ulin na`mati wa mahhilhum qalīlā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَآ أَنكَالًا وَجَحِيمًا
ayas.translation: Lo! with Us are heavy fetters and a raging fire,
ayas.transliteration: inna ladaynā ankālan wajaḥīmā

ayas.arabic: وَطَعَامًا ذَا غُصَّةٍ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
ayas.translation: And food which choketh (the partaker), and a painful doom
ayas.transliteration: waṭa`āman dhā ghuṣṣatin wa`adhāban alīmā

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًا مَّهِيلًا
ayas.translation: On the day when the earth and the hills rock, and the hills become a heap of running sand.
ayas.transliteration: yawma tarjuful-arḍu wal jibālu wakānatil jibālu kathīban mahīlā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًا شَـٰهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًا
ayas.translation: Lo! We have sent unto you a messenger as witness against you, even as We sent unto Pharaoh a messenger.
ayas.transliteration: innā arsalnā ilaykum rasūlan shāhidan `alaykum kamā arsalnā ilā fir`awna rasūlā

ayas.arabic: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ أَخْذًا وَبِيلًا
ayas.translation: But Pharaoh rebelled against the messenger, whereupon We seized him with no gentle grip.
ayas.transliteration: fa`aṣā fir`awnur rasūla fa-akhadhnāhu akhdhan wabīlā

ayas.arabic: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًا يَجْعَلُ ٱلْوِلْدَٰنَ شِيبًا
ayas.translation: Then how, if ye disbelieve, will ye protect yourselves upon the day which will turn children grey,
ayas.transliteration: fakayfa tattaqūna in kafartum yawman yaj`alul wildāna shībā

ayas.arabic: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرٌۢ بِهِۦ ۚ كَانَ وَعْدُهُۥ مَفْعُولًا
ayas.translation: The very heaven being then rent asunder. His promise is to be fulfilled.
ayas.transliteration: as-samā-u munfaṭirun bih ۚ kāna wa`duhu maf`ūlā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
ayas.translation: Lo! This is a Reminder. Let him who will, then, choose a way unto his Lord.
ayas.transliteration: inna hādhihi tadhkirah ۖ faman shā-at-takhadha ilā rabbihi sabīlā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَىِ ٱلَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُۥ وَثُلُثَهُۥ وَطَآئِفَةٌ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مَعَكَ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرْضَىٰ ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِن فَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يُقَـٰتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ ۚ وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا۟ لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًا ۚ وَٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌۢ
ayas.translation: Lo! thy Lord knoweth how thou keepest vigil sometimes nearly two-thirds of the night, or (sometimes) half or a third thereof, as do a party of those with thee. Allah measureth the night and the day. He knoweth that ye count it not, and turneth unto you in mercy. Recite, then, of the Qur'an that which is easy for you. He knoweth that there are sick folk among you, while others travel in the land in search of Allah's bounty, and others (still) are fighting for the cause of Allah. So recite of it that which is easy (for you), and establish worship and pay the poor-due, and (so) lend unto Allah a goodly loan. Whatsoever good ye send before you for your souls, ye will find it with Allah, better and greater in the recompense. And seek forgiveness of Allah. Lo! Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: inna rabbaka ya`lamu annaka taqūmu adnā min thuluthayil layli waniṣfahu wathuluthahu waṭā-ifatun minal ladhīna ma`ak ۚ wallāhu yuqaddirul layla wan nahār ۚ `alima an lan tuḥṣūhu fatāba `alaykum ۖ faqra-ū mā tayassara minal qur-ān ۚ `alima an sayakūnu minkum marḍā wa-ākharūna yaḍribūna fil-arḍi yabtaghūna min faḍlillāhi wa-ākharūna yuqātilūna fī sabīlillāh ۖ faqra-ū mā tayassara minh ۚ wa-aqīmuṣ ṣalāta wa-ātuz zakāta wa-aqriḍullāha qarḍan ḥasanā ۚ wa mā tuqaddimū li-anfusikum min khayrin tajidūhu `indallāhi huwa khayran wa-a`ẓama ajrā ۚ wastaghfirullāh ۖ innallāha ghafūrun raḥīm
